Title: Establishes requirements for library material in public school libraries and public libraries
Summary: Establishes requirements for library material in public school libraries and public libraries; requires the development of policies for removal of materials; establishes protections for school library media specialists and librarians against harassment and discrimination in employment related to the refusal to remove library materials.
LawCode: Add §§249-b & 249-c, Ed L; amd §296, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requirements for library material in public school libraries and public libraries; and to amend the executive law, in relation to prohibiting discrimination against librarians for certain acts
